data.description: Tied array with tied or object storage
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is similar to Tie::Hash::CustomStorage but for Arrays.

    This tied array class makes it easy to also specify a custom
    storage for the array.

    In other words you can get: - a tied array of tied scalar - a tied
    array of object - a tied array of value with automatic
    initialization

    Tie::Hash::CustomStorage was approved a few days ago.

    Thanks
